type.description:
## Glowing

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/glowing)

Checks if the entity is glowing either via the Glowing status effect, [Entity Glow (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/glowing) or [Self Glow (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/glowing).

Type ID: `origins:glowing`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:glowing"
}
```

title: Glowing (Entity Condition Type) date: 2023-02-04

Glowing

Entity Condition Type

Checks if the entity is glowing either via the Glowing status effect, Entity Glow (Power Type) or Self Glow (Power Type).

Type ID: origins:glowing
